item.title: Novo Nordisk’s weight-loss pill is available. Here’s why Lilly’s and Viking’s stocks are down.
item.description: Novo Nordisk’s wildly successful obesity medicine is now available as a pill, making it the first GLP-1 pill for weight loss in the U.S.

item.title: ‘He has become hostile’: My mom is in her 80s and has dementia. My brother is blocking access.
